passage_text: View Resume | Official Photos ». Meghan Ory is a Canadian actress, she was born in Victoria, British Columbia. She Started acting in theater before her teens, but was prohibited by her mother-a drama teacher-from auditioning for film and TV roles until she could pay for her own head shots.

When magic came to Storybrooke at the conclusion of Once Upon a Time 's freshman season, there were high hopes for wolf-shifting Ruby (a.k.a. Little Red Riding Hood) and the troubled character's portrayer, Meghan Ory.

Sad news for Little Red fans: TV Guide has learned that Once Upon a Time ‘s Meghan Ory, who was upped to a series regular this year, will not be returning for season 3.
Once Upon a Time has let go of Meghan Ory (Ruby) after the actress was cast as the lead character in the new CBS drama Intelligence.

Meghan Ory (born August 20, 1982) is a Canadian television and film actress. She is best known for her role as Red Riding Hood /Ruby on the ABC fantasy series Once Upon a Time and also starred in the short-lived CBS drama Intelligence as Riley Neal.

As excited as Meghan Ory may be about her possible return to Once Upon a Time — where during Seasons 1 and 2 she played Ruby/Red Riding Hood-slash-The Wolf — the sartorial ramifications of ABC drama’s midseason twist have her especially jazzed. PHOTOS | Winter TV Spoiler-palooza!
